0.8.name: wordpress/vidoopcaptcha
0.8.description:
VidoopCAPTCHA is a free web service that determines the difference between humans creating a new account on your web site and a computer program aiming to use the account for spamming purposes. Compared to conventional text-based CAPTCHA, VidoopCAPTCHA is easier on the user by employing images rather than distorted words to verify if the user is human, and delivers the web site a marketing advantage through superior usability and branded image placements.

This plugin requires PHP5, compiled with SimpleXML and libcurl.
